passwordFormModal.title: Provide app password
passwordFormModal.description: Input the app password decrypt wallet
passwordFormModal.error: The password provided is incorrect. Please try again

successModalPopup.title: Success!
successModalPopup.description1: The transaction timed out but it will be included in the subsequent blocks

errorModalPopup.title: An error happened!
errorModalPopup.description1: The transfer transaction failed. Please try again later.
errorModalPopup.description2: Please ensure that your have enabled Expert mode on your ledger device.

modal.title: Confirm Wallet Deletion
modal.warning1: Are you sure you want to delete the wallet?
modal.warning2: If you have not backed up your wallet mnemonic phrase, this will result in losing your funds forever.
modal.checkbox1: I understand that the only way to regain access is by restoring wallet mnemonic phrase.
modal.checkbox2: I understand that the only way to regain access is by using the same ledger device with the correct address index

modal.title: Data analytics was added
modal.description1:
You can help improve Crypto.org Chain Wallet by having Data Analytics enabled. The data collected will help the development team prioritize new features and improve existing functionalities.

You can always come back to disable Data Analytics anytime under General Configuration in

send.title: Send
send.description: Move funds from your transfer address to another transfer address or deposit stake to a staking address.

amount.label: Sending Amount
amount.error2: Sending amount exceeds your available wallet balance
amount.error3: Sending amount is lower than minimum allowed of

receive.title: Receive
receive.description: Receive funds by sharing the below wallet address.

notification1.title: Address Copied!
notification1.description: Current account is successfully copied to your clipboard

notification2.title: Cannot detect any Ledger device
notification2.description: Please connect with your Ledger device

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: An invalid configuration might result in wallet malfunction.

nodeUrl.label: Node URL
nodeUrl.error1: Please enter a valid node url

indexingUrl.label: Chain Indexing URL
indexingUrl.error1: Please enter a valid indexing url

memo.title: Default Memo
memo.description: A default memo message will be used for staking transactions if a custom memo is not provided.

dataAnalytics.title: Data Analytics
dataAnalytics.description: The data collected for analytics is used to prioritize development for new features and functionalities and also to improve implemented features.

clearStorage.description: Once you clear the storage, you will lose access to all you wallets. The only way to regain wallet access is by restoring wallet mnemonic phrase.

modal.title: Confirm Clear Storage
modal.description1: You may wish to verify your recovery mnemonic phrase before deletion to ensure that you can restore this wallet in the future.
modal.warning: Are you sure you want to clear the storage? If you have not backed up your wallet mnemonic phrase, you will result in losing your funds forever.
modal.disclaimer: I understand that the only way to regain access is by restoring wallet mnemonic phrase.
